products.Title: Apple Watch Ultra
products.Description: A rugged titanium case, precision dual-frequency GPS, and up to 36 hours of battery life.

products.Title: Apple Watch Series 9
products.Description: The S9 SiP unlocks a magical new double tap gesture and brings a brighter display to your wrist.

products.Title: Apple Watch SE
products.Description: Crash Detection, Emergency SOS, and activity tracking make it a perfect first Apple Watch.
